data.message:
I rhyme to beats make a masterpiece while I eat/
I stand my ground like atrophy of my feet and I keep/
poppin the sheep up in a dream while im bangin bo peep/
The piece underneath the make up of sheets while I sleep/
I reek like im smoking for peace in a circle of chiefs/
My rhymes are all deep like a 6 foot spike on a cleat/
i hunger beats more than a beast havent eaten for weeks/
im playin for keeps read um and weep not givin a bleep/
empty bowl in my teeth and off of my neck just a piece of a
leash/
all of you speak but all that I seek is nothing you teach/
rippin a leach off my feet im getting bit when I reach/
I can imagine the sea of blood suckin feens when I peak/
Tearin my tees up in the street like im going to streak/
Freak on the sleeves now my shady fleece got a crease/
Thatll mean war like a sheik and priest thug and police/ 
That’s a 16, a fleet of versus to keep burning the street/
